item.title: Five actions for happiness (To others and yourself)
item.description:
G.R.E.A.T

  1. Give
  2. Relate
  3. Exercise
  4. Appreciate
  5. Teach yourself

[Give]{style="text-decoration:underline;"}

Giving is the greatest way to achieve happiness, both to the receiver and yourself. Giving can be done in many ways, such as money, words, and even time. By giving something you have to another …
